ygData.subject: Re: Isn't this a monk mailing list?
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm...let see 1) The discussions have revolved around monk issues 2) the people dropping have never contributed 3) fills up your mailbox?  learn to use a
ygData.messageBody:
hmm...let see

1) The discussions have revolved around monk issues
2) the people dropping have never contributed
3) fills up your mailbox? learn to use a filter

On Mon, 20 Sep 1999, Dave Kuehn wrote:

> From: Dave Kuehn <dwkuehn@...>
>
> I'm sure that you have all noticed that people have been dropping from this
> list like flies, and to tell the truth I'm about ready to quit too. I
> didn't sign up to hear people bitch and moan about twinking and spell
> nerfing. While I'm not positive, I would think that most of you didn't
> sign up to hear about it either. Yet that is what fills up my mailbox day
> in and day out now. Please drop it and lets get back to monks before
> anyone else is alienated from what used to be a worthwhile list. If it's
> really an issue for you, just create EQ-Twinkers and EQ-Nerfs mailing lists
> and carry on there.
>
> Dorath
>
>
> >
